"Xiera": "Dark Blast also has a powerful finishing move!"
"<red>Ultimate Impact<c> can only be used once each time you activate Dark Blast, but its power makes it a true deathblow!"

"・Select Ultimate Impact with

"Ultimate Impact is a skill that gathers Photons into your arms and unleashes them all in one powerful blow.

It has very high range and very high attack power, but it can only be used once each time you activate Dark Blast."
